name: DawnSounds
0:
”Alexa open Dawn Sounds”
”Alexa ask Dawn Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dawn sounds
des:
Wake up to the gentle sounds of dawn with this skill. It includes the early morning chirping of birds, the first light rustling of leaves, and the gradual warming sounds of the day beginning.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Dawn Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
